title: Kempei Usui
text:
Kempei Usui (碓井 健平, born May 15, 1987) is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who last played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="Okinawa%20SV">Okinawa SV</a>.
Career.
His father <a href="Hiroyuki%20Usui">Hiroyuki</a> was also a footballer, playing for the Japanese national team and the corporative version of <a href="Kashiwa%20Reysol">Kashiwa Reysol</a> between the 1970s and 1980s. 
After playing for <a href="Okinawa%20SV">Okinawa SV</a> as the last of his career, he retired in December 2019.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 23 February 2020".
